decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly getting artifacts onto the battlefield and using their synergy to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining cheap artifact creatures with cards that allow for card draw and sacrifice effects, the deck is able to maintain pressure on the opponent while generating value and resources. The inclusion of removal spells and burn spells provides additional versatility and disruption to support the aggressive game plan. The deck aims to maintain a fast pace and continuously apply pressure to secure a decisive victory.
